sentences.english: Ask your father to help you.
sentences.chinese: 叫你父亲帮你。

sentences.english: Andrew was very excited about becoming a father.
sentences.chinese: 安德鲁初为人父，非常激动。

sentences.english: I have sinned, Father.
sentences.chinese: 我有罪，神父。

sentences.english: Freud is the father of psychoanalysis.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德是精神分析之父。

detailed_translations.english: a male parent

sentences.english: His mother and father are both doctors.
sentences.chinese: 他的父母都是医生。

sentences.english: the relationship between mother and child
sentences.chinese: 母亲和孩子之间的关系

sentences.english: Goodnight, Mother.
sentences.chinese: 晚安，妈妈。

sentences.english: Mother said they’d met at university.
sentences.chinese: 母亲说他们是在大学里认识的。

sentences.english: If food is scarce, the mother will feed the smaller, weaker chicks.
sentences.chinese: 如果食物稀少，母禽就喂较小、较弱的幼禽。

detailed_translations.english: a female parent of a child or animal

sentences.english: I have two brothers, William and Mark.
sentences.chinese: 我有两个兄弟，威廉和马克。

sentences.english: My big brother (=  older brother  ) has always looked after me.
sentences.chinese: 我哥哥一直照顾我。

sentences.english: my twin brother
sentences.chinese: 我的双胞胎兄弟

sentences.english: We must work together, brothers!
sentences.chinese: 我们必须携手工作，伙计们！

detailed_translations.english: a male who has the same parents as you

sentences.english: Janet and Abby are sisters.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮特和阿比是两姐妹。

sentences.english: He has two sisters and a brother.
sentences.chinese: 他有两个姊妹和一个弟弟。

sentences.english: She’s my twin sister .
sentences.chinese: 她是我的孪生妹妹。

sentences.english: ...the International Monetary Fund and its sister organization, the World Bank.
sentences.chinese: …国际货币基金组织和它的姐妹机构，世界银行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 姐妹；（称志同道合者）姐妹；修女；护士
detailed_translations.english: a girl or woman who has the same parents as you
You can use sister to describe something that is of the same type or is connected in some way to another thing you have mentioned. For example, if a company has a sister company, they are connected.

sentences.english: My grandmothers are both widows.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖母和外祖母都是寡妇。

detailed_translations.english: the mother of your mother or father

sentences.english: His grandfather was a professor.
sentences.chinese: 他爷爷曾是位教授。

detailed_translations.english: the father of your father or mother

sentences.english: Who locked the door?
sentences.chinese: 谁锁的门？

sentences.english: Who do you work for?
sentences.chinese: 你为谁工作？

sentences.english: Who’s that guy with your wife?
sentences.chinese: 和你妻子在一起的那个人是谁？

sentences.english: They never found out who the murderer was.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直未查出谁是凶犯。

sentences.english: She wondered who had sent the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 她不知道是谁送的花。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about which person is involved, or what the name of a person is

sentences.english: ‘Where’s Paul?’ ‘He’s gone to the cinema.’
sentences.chinese: “保罗在哪儿？”“他去看电影了。”

sentences.english: It was he who first suggested the idea.
sentences.chinese: 是他先提出这个想法的。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: You could always ask Beth – she’s got plenty of money.
sentences.chinese: 你总是可以去问贝丝——她有很多钱。

sentences.english: I saw you talking to that girl. Who is she?
sentences.chinese: 我看见你和那个女孩子说话。 她是谁？

sentences.english: What did she say when you told her?
sentences.chinese: 你告诉她时她怎么说？

detailed_translations.chinese: 她（主格）；它（用来指雌性动物或国家、船舶、地球、月亮等）
detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: He acquainted his classmate with my sister.
sentences.chinese: 他把我妹妹介绍给他的同班同学。

sentences.english: He acquainted his classmate with my younger brother.
sentences.chinese: 他把我的弟弟介绍给他的同班同学。

sentences.english: I, who am your classmate, can understand you.
sentences.chinese: 我是你的同班同学,能了解你。

detailed_translations.english: a member of the same class in a school, college or – in the US – a university

sentences.english: Jerry, this is my friend Sue.
sentences.chinese: 杰里，这是我的朋友休。

sentences.english: She’s always out with her friends.
sentences.chinese: 她常同朋友们一起出去。

sentences.english: One of her closest friends died at the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 她的一位密友周末过世了。

sentences.english: I met Jim through a friend.
sentences.chinese: 经一位朋友介绍，我认识了吉姆。

detailed_translations.english: someone who you know and like very much and enjoy spending time with

sentences.english: I was talking to a woman I met on the flight.
sentences.chinese: 我正和一个在飞机上认识的女子交谈。

sentences.english: married women
sentences.chinese: 已婚妇女

sentences.english: a popular women’s magazine
sentences.chinese: 一本受欢迎的女性杂志

sentences.english: When a woman is pregnant, the levels of hormones in her body change.
sentences.chinese: 女人怀孕时，体内的荷尔蒙水平会发生变化。

detailed_translations.english: an adult female person

sentences.english: Both boys and girls can apply to join the choir.
sentences.chinese: 男孩和女孩均可申请加入合唱团。

sentences.english: Girls! Please be quiet.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘们！请安静。

sentences.english: a teenage girl
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的女孩

sentences.english: They have two girls and a boy.
sentences.chinese: 他们有两个女孩和一个男孩。

detailed_translations.english: a female child

sentences.english: There were two men and a woman in the car.
sentences.chinese: 车上有两男一女。

sentences.english: He’s a very kind man.
sentences.chinese: 他是个非常和蔼的人。

sentences.english: a man’s watch
sentences.chinese: 男式手表

sentences.english: All men are equal in the eyes of the law.
sentences.chinese: 法律面前人人平等。

sentences.english: This is one of the worst diseases known to man.
sentences.chinese: 这是人类已知最严重的疾病之一。

detailed_translations.english: an adult male human

sentences.english: The boys wanted to play football.
sentences.chinese: 男孩子们想踢足球。

sentences.english: boys and girls aged 11–18
sentences.chinese: 11到18岁之间的男孩和女孩

sentences.english: What a polite little boy (=  young male child  ) you are.
sentences.chinese: 你真是个有礼貌的小男孩。

sentences.english: Come on, Timmy, act like a big boy (=  an older boy  ) now.
sentences.chinese: 行了，蒂米，要有大男孩的样子了。

sentences.english: Good boy!
sentences.chinese: 好伙计！

detailed_translations.english: a male child, or a male person in general

sentences.english: We sneaked out while Jessie’s mom wasn’t looking.
sentences.chinese: 我们趁杰茜的妈妈没有看到，偷偷地溜了出去。

sentences.english: If you look carefully you can see that the painting represents a human figure.
sentences.chinese: 如果仔细看，就会看出画上是一个人形。

sentences.english: Gina covered her eyes, afraid to look.
sentences.chinese: 吉娜捂住眼睛，不敢看。

sentences.english: Let me have a look at that – I think it’s mine.
sentences.chinese: 让我看一下那个东西——我想它是我的。

detailed_translations.english: to turn your eyes towards something, so that you can see it
an act of looking at something

sentences.english: He took my hand in his.
sentences.chinese: 他握住我的手。

detailed_translations.english: of or belonging to him

sentences.english: Her name is Mandy Wilson.
sentences.chinese: 她的名字是曼迪•威尔逊。

sentences.english: What’s your name?
sentences.chinese: 你叫什么名字？

sentences.english: He didn’t want to do anything to damage the good name of the company.
sentences.chinese: 他不想做任何有损公司良好声誉的事。

sentences.english: They’re a lot better than some airlines I could name.
sentences.chinese: 他们比我叫得上名字的一些航空公司要好得多。

detailed_translations.english: what someone is called
to say what the name of someone or something is, especially officially

sentences.english: Jane? I don’t really know her.
sentences.chinese: 简？我不太认识她。

sentences.english: Margaret wants me to go with her.
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特想让我和她一起去。

sentences.english: Give her the keys.
sentences.chinese: 把钥匙给她。

sentences.english: Her room was pleasant and airy.
sentences.chinese: 她的房间既舒适又通风。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
belonging to or connected with a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned

sentences.english: Shall we go out to the cinema or stay at home?
sentences.chinese: 我们是出去看电影还是待在家里？

sentences.english: You can have ham, cheese, or tuna.
sentences.chinese: 你可以选择火腿、干酪或者金枪鱼。

sentences.english: She wasn’t involved in drugs or anything like that.
sentences.chinese: 她没有涉毒之类的行为。

sentences.english: Grapes are usually either green or red.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄一般要么是绿色，要么是红色。

sentences.english: He’s going to do it whether we like it or not.
sentences.chinese: 不管我们喜欢与否，他都会去做这件事。

sentences.english: It’s going to snow tomorrow, or that’s what the forecast says.
sentences.chinese: 明天要下雪，确切地说，气象预报是这样说的。

detailed_translations.english: used between two words or phrases to show that either of two things is possible, or used before the last in a list of possibilities or choices

sentences.english: a big house
sentences.chinese: 大房子

sentences.english: I need a bigger desk.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一张大一点的桌子。

sentences.english: She had a big grin on her face.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上挂着大大的笑容。

sentences.english: a big increase in crime
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率的大幅上升

sentences.english: Los Angeles is the biggest city in California.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶是加利福尼亚最大的城市。

sentences.english: The garage isn’t big enough for two cars.
sentences.chinese: 这个车库不够大，停不下两辆汽车。

sentences.english: When they lose, they lose in a big way (=  to a large degree  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们要输就输得很惨。

sentences.english: There was this great big (=  extremely big  ) spider in the sink.
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽里有只特大的蜘蛛。

detailed_translations.english: of more than average size or amount

sentences.english: He was young and tall.
sentences.chinese: 他年轻，身材高大。

sentences.english: a house surrounded by tall trees
sentences.chinese: 大树环绕的房子

sentences.english: This bush grows tall very quickly.
sentences.chinese: 这种灌木很快就能长高。

detailed_translations.chinese: 高的；长的；过分的；夸大的
detailed_translations.english: a person, building, tree etc that is tall is a greater height than normal

detailed_translations.chinese: (Tall)人名；(马里、阿拉伯)塔勒；(芬、罗、瑞典)塔尔；(英)托尔；(土)塔勒

sentences.english: a pretty little girl
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的小姑娘

sentences.english: Maria looks much prettier with her hair cut short.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚把头发剪短好看多了。

detailed_translations.english: a woman or child who is pretty has a nice attractive face

sentences.english: a thin gold chain
sentences.chinese: 一条细细的金链

sentences.english: She’s only wearing a thin summer jacket (= a jacket made of light material ) .
sentences.chinese: 她只穿了一件薄薄的夏装外套。

sentences.english: two thin slices of bread
sentences.chinese: 薄薄的两片面包

sentences.english: The road was covered with a thin layer of ice.
sentences.chinese: 路面上覆盖着一层薄薄的冰。

sentences.english: The skin on the eyelids is the thinnest on the body.
sentences.chinese: 眼睑上的皮肤是人体最薄的皮肤。

sentences.english: NATO will continue to thin out its forces.
sentences.chinese: 北约将继续裁军。

sentences.english: NATO will continue to thin out its forces.
sentences.chinese: 北约将继续裁军。

detailed_translations.chinese: 薄的；瘦的；稀薄的；微弱的
detailed_translations.english: if something is thin, there is only a small distance between its two opposite sides or surfaces
Thin out means the same as
Thin out means the same as

sentences.english: a short meeting
sentences.chinese: 一个短会

sentences.english: Morris gave a short laugh.
sentences.chinese: 莫里斯笑了一声。

sentences.english: a short course on business English
sentences.chinese: 商业英语短期课程

sentences.english: Winter is coming and the days are getting shorter.
sentences.chinese: 冬天来临，白天变短了。

sentences.english: I’ve only been in Brisbane a short time .
sentences.chinese: 我才来布里斯班不久。

sentences.english: For a short while (= a short time ) , the city functioned as the region’s capital.
sentences.chinese: 这座城市曾经在很短的一段时间里是这个地区的首府。

sentences.english: I learned a lot during my short period as a junior reporter.
sentences.chinese: 在当初级记者的这段短暂时间里，我学到了许多。

sentences.english: Germany achieved spectacular economic success in a relatively short period of time .
sentences.chinese: 德国在相对较短的时间里取得了非凡的经济成就。

sentences.english: They met and married within a short space of time .
sentences.chinese: 他们从相识到结婚时间很短。

sentences.english: I promise to keep the meeting short and sweet (= short in a way that is good, especially not talking for a long time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我保证会议开得简短不拖拉。

sentences.english: For a few short weeks (= they seemed to pass very quickly ) the sun shone and the fields turned gold.
sentences.chinese: 短短的几个星期里，阳光照耀，田野变成了一片金黄。

detailed_translations.english: happening or continuing for only a little time or for less time than usual
a short film shown in the cinema
to almost do something but then decide not to do it

sentences.english: an extremely handsome young man
sentences.chinese: 一位特别英俊的年轻人

sentences.english: They won a handsome victory in the elections.
sentences.chinese: 他们在选举中取得了重大的胜利。

detailed_translations.english: a man who is handsome looks attractive

sentences.english: the city’s new hospital
sentences.chinese: 市里新建的医院

sentences.english: the new issue of ‘Time’ magazine
sentences.chinese: 新一期《时代周刊》

sentences.english: new products on the market
sentences.chinese: 市场上的新产品

sentences.english: The hardest part of this job is understanding the new technology.
sentences.chinese: 这项工作最难的地方是理解新技术。

sentences.english: a young man with new ideas
sentences.chinese: 一个有新观念的年轻人

detailed_translations.english: recently made, built, invented, written, designed etc

sentences.english: His friends live above the bookshop.
sentences.chinese: 他的朋友们住在书店的楼上。

sentences.english: Do you know where I can find a good bookshop?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我在哪里可以找到好书店?

sentences.english: If you can't do anything on that scale (travel far and wide, or go back to college), you may chose to go to an interesting lecture at a bookshop and come away quite stimulated by what you hear.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在这一时期什么也不能做（比如旅行，郊游，读书等），那么你可以选择参加书店里有趣的演讲，你将会听到非常刺激的东西。

detailed_translations.english: a shop that sells books

sentences.english: The road to the zoo turns off here.
sentences.chinese: 通向动物园的路由这儿拐弯。

sentences.english: The parrots in the zoo are popping all the time.
sentences.chinese: 动物园里的鹦鹉一直在生小鹦鹉。

sentences.english: Lionesses bearing cubs in the zoo is nothing new now.
sentences.chinese: 狮子在动物园繁殖早已屡见不鲜了。

detailed_translations.english: a place, usually in a city, where animals of many kinds are kept so that people can go to look at them

sentences.english: His mother always used to pick him up from school.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲以前一直去学校接他。

detailed_translations.english: a place where children are taught
to train or teach someone to have a certain skill, type of behaviour, or way of thinking

sentences.english: His eyes roved round the supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 他的眼睛环视了一下超级市场。

sentences.english: The whole supermarket was ruined in a great fire.
sentences.chinese: 整个超级市场被一场大火烧掉。

sentences.english: The supermarket near our school will be reopened soon.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校附近的那个超级市场不久将重新开业。

detailed_translations.english: a very large shop that sells food, drinks, and things that people need regularly in their homes

sentences.english: Let’s go for a walk in the park.
sentences.chinese: 我们去公园散步吧。

sentences.english: a park bench
sentences.chinese: 公园长椅

sentences.english: a flat overlooking Hyde Park
sentences.chinese: 一套可以俯瞰海德公园的公寓

detailed_translations.english: a large open area with grass and trees, especially in a town, where people can walk, play games etc

sentences.english: They are building a new hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在建一家新医院。

detailed_translations.english: a large building where sick or injured people receive medical treatment

sentences.english: The plate went crashing to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 盘子哗啦一声掉在地板上。

sentences.english: The bullet went flying over my head.
sentences.chinese: 子弹从我头顶飞过。

sentences.english: John went rushing off down the corridor.
sentences.chinese: 约翰沿走廊飞奔而去。

sentences.english: Her hair is starting to go grey.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发开始变白了。

detailed_translations.english: to move in a particular way, or to do something as you are moving

sentences.english: The wind blew the door to.
sentences.chinese: 风把门吹上了。

detailed_translations.english: if a door is pushed to, it closes or almost closes

detailed_translations.chinese: 到；向；（表示时间、方向）朝…方向
detailed_translations.english: used to say where someone or something goes

detailed_translations.chinese: (To)人名；(柬)多；(中)脱(普通话·威妥玛)

sentences.english: I walked across the grass.
sentences.chinese: 我走在草地上。

sentences.english: Keep off the grass.
sentences.chinese: 请勿践踏草地。

detailed_translations.english: an area of grass, especially an area where the grass is kept cut short

sentences.english: As a kid, I loved to climb trees.
sentences.chinese: 小时候，我喜欢爬树。

sentences.english: the trunk of an old oak tree (= the main central part, from which the branches grow )
sentences.chinese: 一棵老橡树的树干

detailed_translations.english: a very tall plant that has branches and leaves, and lives for many years

sentences.english: a lovely rose bush with delicate pink flowers
sentences.chinese: 一簇开着娇嫩的粉红色花朵的美丽蔷薇

sentences.english: fields full of beautiful wild flowers
sentences.chinese: 开满美丽野花的田野

sentences.english: It was May, and the apple trees were all in flower.
sentences.chinese: 那是个5月，苹果树开满了花。

detailed_translations.english: a coloured or white part that a plant or tree produces before fruit or seeds

sentences.english: a fishing boat
sentences.chinese: 渔船

sentences.english: The boat capsized (=  turned over  ) in heavy seas.
sentences.chinese: 船在波涛汹涌的大海上倾覆了。

sentences.english: a boat trip around the islands
sentences.chinese: 乘船环岛旅行

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that travels across water

sentences.english: Lake Michigan
sentences.chinese: 密歇根湖

detailed_translations.english: a large area of water surrounded by land

sentences.english: Their house is on a hill overlooking the sea.
sentences.chinese: 他们的房子建在可以俯视大海的小山上。

sentences.english: A cart was making its way up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 一辆马车正在爬上山丘。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land that is higher than the land around it, like a mountain but smaller

sentences.english: Are you going home for Christmas?
sentences.chinese: 你回家过圣诞节吗？

sentences.english: a Christmas present
sentences.chinese: 圣诞礼物

sentences.english: the Christmas holidays
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节假期

sentences.english: Merry Christmas and a happy New Year everyone!
sentences.chinese: 祝大家圣诞快乐、新年快乐！

detailed_translations.english: the period of time around December 25th, the day when Christians celebrate the birth of Christ

sentences.english: Employees must show their identity cards at the gate.
sentences.chinese: 雇员在大门口必须出示自己的身份卡。

sentences.english: I haven’t got my membership card yet.
sentences.chinese: 我还没拿到会员卡。

sentences.english: a piece of card
sentences.chinese: 一张卡片纸

sentences.english: My name’s Adam Carver. Here’s my card.
sentences.chinese: 我叫亚当•卡弗，这是我的名片。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of plastic or paper containing information about a person or showing, for example, that they belong to a particular organization, club etc

sentences.english: She was presented with an award .
sentences.chinese: 她被授予一个奖项。

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone, for example at a formal or official occasion

sentences.english: He marched off, whistling a merry tune.
sentences.chinese: 他吹着一首欢快的曲子大步走了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 愉快的；微醉的；嬉戏作乐的
detailed_translations.english: used to say that you hope someone will have a happy time at Christmas

sentences.english: Do you think the music’s too loud?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得音乐太响了吗？

sentences.english: You’ve put too much salt in the soup.
sentences.chinese: 你往汤里放盐太多。

sentences.english: There are too many cars on the road.
sentences.chinese: 路上车辆太多。

detailed_translations.english: more than is acceptable or possible

sentences.english: What are you doing here?
sentences.chinese: 你们在这里干什么？

sentences.english: Shall we eat here?
sentences.chinese: 我们在这里吃好吗？

sentences.english: Come here for a minute.
sentences.chinese: 到这里来一下。

sentences.english: This switch here controls the lights.
sentences.chinese: 此处的这个开关控制电灯。

sentences.english: My friend here will show you the way.
sentences.chinese: 我这位朋友会给你指路的。

sentences.english: Come on. I’m over here .
sentences.chinese: 快点，我在这里。

sentences.english: Will you be back here tonight?
sentences.chinese: 今晚你回这里吗？

sentences.english: There are no good pubs round here .
sentences.chinese: 这一带没有好的酒吧。

sentences.english: Let’s settle the matter here and now .
sentences.chinese: 我们现在就解决此事吧。

detailed_translations.english: used after a verb or preposition to mean ‘in, at or to this position or place ’

name: for
trans: （表示接受某事物或从某事物中获益的人）

sentences.english: I’ve got a present for you.
sentences.chinese: 我有件礼物送给你。

sentences.english: Someone left a message for Vicky.
sentences.chinese: 有人给维基留了言。

sentences.english: an English course for foreign students
sentences.chinese: 为外国学生开的一门英语课程

sentences.english: WWhat did you do that for?
sentences.chinese: 你那样做是为了什么？

sentences.english: We could hardly see for the mist.
sentences.chinese: 由于雾气，我们几乎什么也看不见。

detailed_translations.english: used to say who is intended to get or use something, or where something is intended to be used

sentences.english: I haven’t had a chance to thank him yet.
sentences.chinese: 我还没有机会向他表示谢意。

sentences.english: They accepted their certificates with words of thanks.
sentences.chinese: 他们接过证书，同时表示了谢意。

sentences.english: They accepted their certificates with words of thanks.
sentences.chinese: 他们接过证书，同时表示了谢意。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that you are pleased and grateful for something they have done, or to be polite about it
When you express your thanks to someone, you express your gratitude to them for something
When you express your thanks to someone, you express your gratitude to them for something

sentences.english: It’s a lovely house and we’ve been very happy here.
sentences.chinese: 房子很漂亮，我们住在这里非常开心。

sentences.english: I’ve never felt happier in my life.
sentences.chinese: 我一生从未感到如此快乐。

sentences.english: He was a happy child who rarely cried.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个快乐的孩子，很少哭鼻子。

sentences.english: the happy faces of the children
sentences.chinese: 孩子们快乐的表情

sentences.english: This has been the happiest day of my life.
sentences.chinese: 这是我一生中最快乐的一天。

detailed_translations.english: having feelings of pleasure, for example because something good has happened to you or you are very satisfied with your life
